cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22.1)
project(cmakeeasy VERSION 2.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX)
find_package(SFML 2 REQUIRED COMPONENTS graphics window system)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE true)

add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} src/Main.cpp
src/Manager.cpp
src/AltString.cpp
src/Application.cpp
src/Manager.cpp)

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE sfml-graphics)
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE sfml-system)
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE sfml-window)

   install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME} DESTINATION "C:/Program Files/CMakeEasy" PERMISSIONS OWNER_EXECUTE)
